visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type should be 'line', chart title should be 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels should have specific styling with colors and font sizes, data series should include the name 'Rainfall' and its data, custom colors should be used, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes a gradient background for the plot area. The x-axis categories represent the months from January to December, and the y-axis title is 'Rainfall (mm)'. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes monthly rainfall data. Custom colors are applied to the series and text elements for better readability. Additional configurations include disabling the credits, enabling the legend, and styling the legend items. The plotOptions for the line series disable markers for a cleaner look.
